channel.title: Npcs using 2 attacks
channel.description:
I was planning on making a new fight cave minigame out of the old torso minigame from project destiny and I have all the fight cave monster emotes. Except the mage attacks for ket-zek and tz-xil or whatever his name is, the one that shoots spikes out of his back. I have the jads 3 attacks but I thought if i could just make the other 2 monsters 2 attacks, it didn't work. Could anyone help me on how to make an npc use 2 attacks on a player? I'll send the emotes I am trying to use and the ids
Ket-Zek id [code]2743[/code]
Emotion for his magic attack [code]2647[/code]
Tok-Xil id [code]2739[/code]
Emotion for his range attack [code]2633[/code]
Thanks

item.title: Npcs using 2 attacks
